data.text:
Bill is the Lead Pastor Bethel Church.

Bill is the Founder of Bill Johnson Ministries.

Bill is a Member of the Apostolic Council of Prophetic Elders.

Bill is Member of the Global Council of Empowered21, co-chaired by Billy Wilson (President of Oral Roberts University) and George O. Wood (Assemblies of God).

Bill is the Co-Founder of the Revival Alliance.

Bill is the Co-Founder of the Bethel Leadership Network.

Bill is a Core Faculty Professor at the Wagner University.

Bill is married to Brenda (Beni) Johnson, father of Brian Johnson, Eric Johnson and Leah Valenzuela Johnson.

Find out who Bill Johnson endorses on Facebook, Twitter & Instagram.
